abstract.text: Discover the flexibility, versatility and power of Pixar‚Äôs Universal Scene Description (USD) for your 3D workflows. Learn how you can use the USD file format in your professional workflows for macOS: Scan 3D models of your real-world objects using Object Capture, utilize the potential of third-party digital content creation tools, and build high-quality rendered sequences.

abstract.text: Discover the fundamentals of Pixar‚Äôs Universal Scene Description (USD) and learn how it can help you build great 3D assets and workflows. We‚Äôll introduce you to the core concepts behind USD and explore how you can integrate the format into your content creation pipeline. We‚Äôll also show you how to harness the power of USD by using composition to create flexible and versatile assets.
Xcode 13, Swift 5.5, iOS 15, macOS 12 (Monterey), tvOS 15, watchOS 8.

Discover proposed schema and structure updates to the Universal Scene Description (USD) standard. Learn how you can use Reality Composer to build AR content with interactive properties like anchoring, physics, behaviors, 3D text, and spatial audio that exports to USDZ. And, discover streamlined workflows that help you bring newly-created objects into your app.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Discover how to easily compose, edit, and preview 3D content with Reality Composer Pro. Follow along as we explore this developer tool by setting up a new project, composing scenes, adding particle emitters and audio, and even previewing content on device.

Discover the latest advancements in tooling to help you generate, inspect, and convert Universal Scene Description (USD) assets. We‚Äôll learn about updates to these tools and help you integrate them into your content creation pipeline. We‚Äôll also explore the power of USD Hydra rendering, and show how you can integrate it into your own apps.

Object Capture provides a quick and easy way to create lifelike 3D models of real-world objects using just a few images. Learn how you can get started and bring your assets to life with Photogrammetry for macOS. And discover best practices with object selection and image capture to help you achieve the highest-quality results.
